title: Cold War-style power grab plays out with deadly consequences on the streets of Kazakhstan
US sanctions on Russia would impose 'severe and overwhelming' economic costs, officials say
description: The US is prepared to impose a range of harsh economic penalties on Russia should it move to invade Ukraine, starting with high-impact targets that would impose "severe and overwhelming costs on Russia's economy," Biden administration officials tell CNN.

title: Cold War-style power grab plays out with deadly consequences on the streets of Kazakhstan
Bodies of slain journalists show no signs of being burned
description: Two Haitian journalists were burned alive by a gang in the country's capital on Thursday, a source with the Haitian Security Forces told CNN.

title: Under investigation: Man engulfed in flames after being tased
description: The New York attorney general's office is investigating the death of 29-year-old Jason Jones. Video shows Jones catching on fire after being tased in the Catskill Police Department's lobby.

title: James Webb Space Telescope successfully unfolds its giant gold mirror in space
description: Just 14 days after launching, the world's most complex space observatory has already overcome some of its greatest challenges. The James Webb Space Telescope successfully completed the unfolding of its giant gold mirror on Saturday.

title: Sinéad O'Connor's son dies at age of 17 after going missing
description: Sinéad O'Connor's 17-year-old son has died, the singer's management company confirmed to CNN on Saturday.

title: Snowstorm kills at least 21 tourists at Pakistani resort
description: At least 16 people have been killed in a snowstorm in the northeastern Pakistan resort town of Murree.

title: The judge who sentenced Ahmaud Arbery's killers held a minute of silence to represent a 'fraction' of the time they chased him
description: Before he sentenced three men convicted of killing Ahmaud Arbery in south Georgia to life in prison, Judge Timothy R. Walmsley held a minute of silence Friday, saying he hoped to contextualize the time the 25-year-old spent being chased by the defendants.

title: Study reveals dogs are first nonprimate to possess spontaneous language ability
description: As a kid, I thought Dr. Dolittle had a pretty good gig.

title: Fact check: J.D. Vance falsely claims dozens of jailed Capitol protesters haven't been charged with a crime
description: J.D. Vance, a Republican candidate for a US Senate seat in Ohio, is a law school graduate. But Vance made a significant false claim on Thursday about legal proceedings against people who allegedly participated in the Capitol insurrection last year.

title: German killer who wanted to 'live out cannibalistic fantasies' faces life in prison
description: A German man who carried out a murder with "cannibalistic motives" has been sentenced to life in prison by a Berlin regional court.

title: Cancer-stricken mom takes out Times Square billboard to help her daughter find love
description: A mother's love knows no bounds, even if that means creating a billboard in the middle of Times Square in order for your daughter to find love.

title: Photos show Djokovic unmasked at event the day after documents show he tested positive
See doctor's warning about possibly having to let patients die
description: Dr. Steven Stites joins New Day Weekend to discuss the Omicron and Delta coronavirus waves and how they are affecting the care hospitals can give to patients.

title: 'Yellowjackets' takes our '90s nostalgia and gives it fangs
description: (Note: Some spoilers follow for the episodes of "Yellowjackets" that have already aired.)

title: CES 2022: 5 takeaways from the giant tech trade show
description: CES, the closely-watched annual consumer electronics show, looked drastically different this year.

title: Snow leopard dies at Illinois zoo after contracting Covid-19
description: A snow leopard has died after contracting Covid-19 at Miller Park Zoo in Bloomington, Illinois.

title: Zendaya dives into drama with new season of 'Euphoria'
description: The holidays are over, and you are either happy about that or sad.

title: See Mariah Bell become oldest champion in nearly a century
description: 25-year-old Mariah Bell won the US women's figure skating national title, making her the oldest champion in 95 years.

title: 16 killed in gas explosion in southwest China
description: At least 16 people were killed and 10 others injured Friday in a gas explosion in southwestern China, according to the country's Ministry of Emergency Management.

title: Biden officials weighing Russia sanctions options after warnings about economic fallout, heightened cyber risk for US and allies
description: The Biden administration is still weighing exactly how it would penalize Russia if the country invades Ukraine, as US diplomats are just days away from high-stakes meetings with Kremlin officials.

title: Aid workers say Ethiopia air strike in northwest Tigray killed 56 people
description: An air strike in Ethiopia's northern region of Tigray killed 56 people and wounded at least 30 in a camp for the internally displaced, two aid workers told Reuters on Saturday, citing local authorities and eyewitness accounts.

title: $8M Marble Arch Mound to close after just six disappointing months
description: Just six months after opening, London's newest tourist attraction is shutting its doors.

title: Follow these steps before buying Covid testing kits
description: Covid-19 cases continue to rise dramatically, leading to brutally long lines at testing sites and empty shelves at stores where at-home rapid test kits were once in stock.

title: The world's best-performing airline has been revealed
description: Among the clouds over 2022, we're finding silver linings. Some popular countries for tourism are relaxing entry restrictions, and the world's safest and most punctual airlines have been revealed.

title: This community was reeling from a mass shooting and several Covid-19 surges. Then a fire wiped out hundreds of homes
description: When Gurjeet Gill Dhanoa's family moved from Canada nearly 23 years ago, they planned to operate the Tandoori Grill in Boulder County, Colorado, for just a few months. But the restaurant proved successful and they stayed, putting down roots in the community they now call home.

title: Sidney Poitier moved to the Jim Crow South as a teenager. Here's what he said about race in America
description: Sidney Poitier refused to be defined by race from the start of his decades-long career, but his best-known performances advanced the depiction of Black actors and pushed audiences to confront racial tensions in America.

title: 3 women brutally killed in France, in 'unbearable' start to year
description: On January 1, three women were killed in France, each allegedly by a partner or ex-partner, in what feminist campaigners described as an "unbearable" start to another year's tally of violence.

title: Mariah Bell becomes the oldest US women's figure skating national champion in 95 years
description: It's been a long wait for 25-year-old Mariah Bell.

title: The complicated politics around Novak Djokovic's visa dispute
description: CNN's Bianca Nobilo breaks down what's behind the high emotions surrounding Novak Djokovic's Covid-19 vaccine controversy. He is confined to a hotel in Melbourne as he mounts a legal challenge to the revocation of his visa ahead of the Australian Open.

title: She's the first woman to win more than $1 million on 'Jeopardy!'
description: Amy Schneider, an engineering manager from Oakland, California, became the first woman and the fourth person on "Jeopardy!" to earn more than $1 million in winnings on Friday's episode.

title: Lani Guinier, voting rights champion and former assistant attorney general nominee, dies at 71
description: Lani Guinier, a legal scholar and champion for voting rights who was once nominated to be assistant attorney general by then-President Bill Clinton, died on Friday, her cousin, Sherrie Russell-Brown, confirmed to CNN. She was 71.

title: Harsh reality of China's zero-Covid approach
description: As harrowing stories continue to emerge from within the locked-down city of Xi'an, a wave of disbelief has washed over the Chinese public: why are such tragedies still unfolding two years into the pandemic, in a major metropolis of 13 million people?

title: Evacuations ordered due to imminent flooding from heavy rain and snow in Washington state
description: Record rain and snow will cause floods, possible landslides, and higher avalanche risks across western Washington state, with more forecast to fall through the weekend.

title: Life sentences for killers of Black jogger
description: Three White men who chased and murdered 25-year-old Black jogger Ahmaud Arbery in south Georgia were sentenced to life in prison Friday, with two having no chance of parole.

title: High school hockey player dies from injury
description: A high school hockey player in Connecticut has died after a collision during a game.
